name: Maplestory Pachingko
description:
An extremely simplistic version of Maplestory Pachingko that appeared in JMS. I didn't have access to all the assets required to faithfully recreate it. Plus, this was mostly so I could learn how to do UI buttons.

How to play: Click STOP to stop the spinner. Click the button with japanese characters on the left to reset.

Keep in mind there's no way to actually win :)
